detailsOfAchievement: PRAN (Preservation and Proliferation of Rural Resources and Nature) is spinoff from PRADAN and got registered in 2012 as an independent trust. It is founded by Anil Kumar Verma ex-Team Leader, PRADAN. PRANâ€™s work is highly recognised across many countries. The print and electronic media from across the world visited PRAN projects and covered its activities widely .Guardian, Newyark times, German, Austrian, chinese, BBC and other countries print and electronic media paid attention to PRANâ€™s rural work benefitting small and marginal farmers. PRAN won best NGO award by Bihar Agricultural University for promoting agro-ecology in 2015. In 2014 PRAN got a national level Skoch award for mainstreaming the agro-ecology bringing food security to small and marginal farmers in Bihar. PRAN project farmers Mr Jayjeet Kumar was honoured by Mr Narendra Modi the then chief minister of Gujarat. Another farmer Santosh Kumar received award from Mr Sharad Pawar, ex Agricultural minister of India. PRAN was invited by several countries to present its experience on SRI method of crop cultivation. PRANâ€™s experience was shared in Harvard university, Boston and Cornell university at Ithaca, USA. Post Graduate students in agricultural streams from France, Cambridge university, London, England and Harvard university visited PRANâ€™s project. Director, SRI centre at Cornell University Dr Erika Styger along with world bank representative from Mali and many other foreign dignitaries visited our project. During 2015-16, we worked with 26145 households. Among these 33% were SC, 66% are OBCs and rest 1% others. All the participant families are women. The small and marginal farmers who have been associated with PRAN have enhanced crop productivity and are getting food-grains security round the year which earlier were only for 3-6 months. They are also getting additional cash to meet household security. In our current project area we have formed 150 common Interest Groups. The members of Common Interest Groups are all women.

detailsOfAchievement: CHILD LABOUR SCHOOL - The organization is running child labour school in Gaya District with the help of National Child Labour Project Gaya. In this school 400 such rescued child labourers is getting formal education and vocational training including health and medicine. NON RESIDENTIAL BRIDGE COURSE â€“ The organization is running non residential bridge course for out of school children in Jamtara district in Jharkhand. Where 200 childrenâ€™s are getting formal education. RESIDENTIAL BRIDGE COURSE FOR GIRLS â€“ The organization is running Residential Bridge Course for 100 girl child in Jamtara district with Sarv Shiksha Abhiyan, Jharkhand. DISABLED AND OLD AGE CARE PROGRAMME- The organization has organized programme for the cure of old age & disabled people of the society. The organization organized a free health check up camp & disabled detection camp. About 29 such persons are given medical aid and other facilities. ADOLSCENT CAMP ROSE, main motto is to control atrocities against adolescent we have organized a training camp for the development and upliftment of Adolscent of the area. 235 such adolescent has got benefited through this camp. NATIONAL INTEGRATION CAMP- Society was organized Independence Day, Republic Day, Labour Day, AIDS Day, Bal Divas, Mahila Sashakti Divas, Sanskrit Divas, Hindi Divas & Ambedkar Jayanti to organize and unit the youth of the area. DRUG ABUSE WELFARE PROGRAMME â€“ The organization has organized programme for the welfare of drug abuse and drug addict of the area. In this programme society has given medical aid and counseling of 15 such drug abuse of the area. WOMENS EMPOWERMENT ROSE, organized workshop on Child & Women Labour in this workshop aout 200 man & woman participated at this workshop about 200 men & women participated at this programme a pilot education programme covered in working area supported with other organizationof the area. The programme can be replicated in other working areas to discontinue the practice of employing child labour, employees and employer were advised by our organization to step employment of child labour as they growth of children affected and mental & physical progress hampered. Regular monitoring being done to stop the evils. LITERACY PROGRAMME - Universal literacy is a national goal. The ROSE literacy unit identifies. Empowerment of women education in primitive community ROSE believes that a change4 in society can be brought by education in its endeavor time prove the livelihood of society imparting education through running. SHG FORMATION - We have been making_intensive efforts to promote formation of SHG in our project area because heavy in follow of Government subsidy in this region, the concept of enter premiership is lacking among the local people, in some of our project to constitute village committee at village level a leadership camp for one day was conducted in the Ist week of march, 1996. the camp was participatory and experiential in nature. Twenty five would be leader from 10 villages attended the camp. Three training programme organized for the benefit of SHG Members, leader of SHG, Enterpreneur of SHG Members. VOCATIONAL TRAINING PROGRAMME - Training in the following categories of trades was important to stand on their fact programme are income oriented. This training programme is organized in working areas. The subject and number are as Assembling and Servicing of pumping set & Generator, No. of Beneficiaries- 10. Assembling & Servicing of Telephone set & fan.2. Madhubani Painting .13, Handicraft14, Knitting, Tailoring & Embroidery17, Typing/Shorthand19,Computer 3, Carpentry10, jute product like Bag, Dari, Kalin etc.12, Bamboo Tokari, Sup, Dauri etc. 15, Kush Grass product like Chhika, Mauni, Chatai18. Due to the training the trainees were able to earn their livelihood. They raised their status as a result of training and they have not to depend on others. HEALTH AND FAMILY WELFARE PROG.- ROSE, running a Hospital at its work area for the benefit of Mother & Child of remote areas BPL families in this year 115 women and 95 New child were immunized & treated. We are also counseling for better & healthy to all women.Giving service in Govt. hospitals in East and West Champaran district in Bihar. AIDS/CANCER CONTROL PROGRAMME- During this financial year AIDS counseling inter programmed was continued Interaction with commercial sex worker , MSM, Truck drivers, Migrated people & Street labourers 270 beneficiaries, treated & benefited from this programmed. ROSE has been working for city awareness about kileer disease since 1990. Initially three training workshop were conducted, Two for NGOS willing to the work this area and one with special emphasis on the women. The out come from the workshop develop in the form of training manuals. WELFARE PROGRAMME FOR SC/ST- The organization has organized a two day camp for the awareness on education and health for the SC/ST people in its works area. ENVIORNMENTAL AWARENESS PROGRAMME â€“ ROSE Project management committee started a networking of forest for environment protection two workshop been organize on environment through watershed and plantation and protection though social forestry. RURAL DEVELOPMENT- In Walmi of Patna district the organization is running programme for development of Villages. One innovative house been prepared through community contribution all the material and labor was gifted by local community only technical support was given by ROSE, Six BPL House been repaired & constructed in the area. AGRICULTURE AND HORTICULTURE DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME â€“ To raise the economic status of the people living within the poverty line,horticulture was given sue importance in that 3 fruit plants were distributed to each family numbering 120 families of villages of district. Large numberd of gathering of local people and they were eager to receive the plants and them in their own field. The gathering was do strong that ittook nearly 4 hours for the process of distribution plants. The scheme becomes very popular. It such scheme is again brought after reasonable interval, this is definitely going to change the shape of district and in entire will be asset to the people. Watershed Development programme The organisation is implementing watershed Dev. Programe in Ramgargh and jamtara district in Jharkhand state.
